params.note: Lineage recorder based on Sleeping Beauty transposon system with poly-adenylated GFP or RFP reporter driven by RPBSA promoter, containing an 11-nucleotide random barcode in the 3' UTR.
Human U6 promoter located 91 bases opposite to RPBSA promoter drives a gRNA targeting the 3' portion of GFP or RFP coding sequence.
iTracer construct is introduced into iPSCs containing a doxycycline-inducible Cas9 cassette (iCRISPR) via electroporation.
